import sys
for t in range(int(raw_input())):
    n  = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    in_time = map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split(' '))
    out_time = map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split(' '))
    min_in_time = min(in_time)
    max_out_time = max(out_time)
    
    #print 'min and max times ',min_in_time, max_out_time
    
    no_of_guest = 0
    max_no_of_guests = -1
    for time in range(min_in_time,max_out_time+1):
        # entire list has to be search because there can be more than one occurence of the time
        if time in in_time:
            t = len([i for i, x in enumerate(in_time) if x == time])
            no_of_guest += t
        if time in out_time:
            t = len([i for i, x in enumerate(out_time) if x == time])
            no_of_guest -= t
        if no_of_guest >max_no_of_guests:
            max_no_of_guests = no_of_guest

        #print 'time = ',time,' no of guests ', no_of_guest

    print max_no_of_guests
